name: 余盛延
objective:
本課程旨在發展學生獨立規劃及從事研究的能力，學生可在指導老師的指導下，依個別的需求選擇研究的方向，訂定題目，並獨立完成研究計畫，撰寫報告。
專題研究範圍含：
實驗研究
量調查研究或質調查研究
個案研究
回溯研究
文化比較研究
理論闡述研究
schedule:
Week 1  General Introduction

Week 2  Decide a text for your project.

Week 3  Decide a text for your project.

Week 4  Preliminary discussion of the primary text

Week 5  Preliminary discussion of the primary text

Week 6  Find and read secondary texts.

Week 7  Find and read secondary texts.

Week 8  Find and read secondary texts.

Week 9  Find and read secondary texts.

Week 10  Find and read secondary texts.

Week 11  Find and read secondary texts.

Week 12  Write a summary of the primary text.

Week 13  Submit a summary of the primary text.

Week 14  Compile an annotated bibliography for the project (MLA Format).

Week 15  Compile an annotated bibliography for the project (MLA Format).

Week 16  Compile an annotated bibliography for the project (MLA Format).

Week 17  Analyze a secondary text (MLA Format).

Week 18  Submit your critical analysis of a secondary text (MLA Format).
scorePolicy:
Individual conference: 40%
Timely submission of project assignments: 30%
Timely revision: 30%
